p: The incidence rate ratio was also estimated for each arboviral infection comparing dengue non-naïve and dengue naïves [ 46– 48]. The hazard ratios (HRs) and 95% confidence intervals (95% CIs) for dengue and other arboviral infections were estimated using a Cox proportional hazards model and adjusting for potential confounders such as age, gender, city, and prior exposure to dengue [ 48, 49]. All the statistical analyses were done in R, version 3.2.1 [ 50].
